ygData.subject: Guilds (was Twinking...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is kind of a shame; maybe you need a new guild.  I spent a lot of the last weekend running around looking for lambent components on my own (because I
ygData.messageBody:
Mike Roach wrote:
>
> From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
>
> Even though I really like our guild Robynn, I have learned not to rely on
> them for anything. I realize your not saying that you do...but if I find
> myself grouped with a guildmate its usually because of coincidence. No one
> from our guild has ever come to my aid because I asked, only if it was
> convenient.
>
> Faras Tar'Linedhel
> Half-Elf Bard
> E'ci
> ______________________________

This is kind of a shame; maybe you need a new guild. I spent a lot of the last
weekend running around looking for lambent components on my own (because I think I'm
high enough level to do so), but my guild interactions included:

1. I got into two Lower Guk groups with five others in the same Guild (different
people each time).

2. Cleric comes from FP to Sol A (when he was headed to Guk) to help me retrieve my
corpse from the lava at the bottom of the stairs (I needed goblin protection).

3. Wizard offers me a Lambent Stone, in return I help her kill a named Shadowknight
and a Skeleton Monk in Upper Guk for her Acumen Mask quest (now that little excursion
brought back some of the fear I've missed lately, let me tell you...)

4. Same Wizard later offers me another Lambent Stone, in return I help her get a
drop off of the Shadowmen in Lavastorm. We both die on the first attempt (they're
too closely packed for Lament to work right).

5. Level 45 Ranger comes six zones out of his way to pull Shadowmen for us.

6. Level 50 Warrior asks if I can help him heal in Sol A, so I do.

7. I help his level 26 Enchanter get 2/3 bubble in 30 minutes by Chain/Pixie
Striking goblins (ungrouped) and singing Mana Song (group) so she and her pet can
kill them in relative safety.

8. He takes me to Sol B and gets me some nice exp fighting no-exp-for-him kobolds.
(Would have been better if i know where the blankety-blank zone point was. I died
right next to it after running in circles for two minutes...)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 34 songs, Innoruuk
